about: A motivated Frontend Developer with 4+ years of experience in developing and maintaining user interfaces for websites and applications. Profcient in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, with sound knowledge of Angular. Passionate about developing responsive and accessible user interfaces that meet the needs of clients and end-users. A collaborative team player as well as an individual contributor with excellent communication skills, who is committed to continuous learning and keeping up-to-date with the industrial trends and best practices in the field.
